Translations.Text: Who evil than unu atribu est mensog DI while disbelieving en truth ven him? est Infer ne just requital disbelievers
As por those promote truth kred therein ili est des righteous
Ili get cxio ili wish their Lord Such est rekompenc por des righteous
DI remits their sinful works REKOMPENC them generously POR their BON works
est DI ne sufficient His servant? Ili frighten vi idols ili set Him. Whomever DI send astray nothing direkt him
whomever DI direkt nothing send him astray! est DI ne Almighty Avenger

Vi pet them Who kre heavens ter? ili dir DI. Dir tiam do vi set idols DI? Se DI willed any adversity me ili relieve such adversity? Kaj se Li willed ben por me can ili prevent such ben Dir DI est sufficient me Him trusters fid
dir O my popol do your put mi do my put; vi do gxi surely trov out
(Vi do gxi trov out) who incurred shameful punishment ind etern retribution
Ni revealed scripture vi por popol truthfully. Tiam whoever direkt direkt his own bon whoever ir astray ir astray his own detriment! Vi ne est their advokat

DI puts ANIM death when end DE their life ven ANKAUX je des temp da DORM. Tiel Li sorb kelk their dorm while others allowed ad viv end de their predetermined interim This proviz lecion popol who reflect
Ili invent intercessors mediate them DI? Dir Ki se ili ne posed any potenc nor kompren
Dir All intercession aparten al DI. Him aparten all sovereignty de heavens ter tiam al Him vi returned
When DI SOL menci kor de those ne kred en Hereafter sxrump aversion. when others menci Him ili igx sat
Proklam Our di Initiator de heavens ter Knower de all sekret declarations Vi est des nur Unu jugx Your servants their disput
those transgressed owned cxio ter eben twice as mult ili readily don gxi evit terrible retribution Tag Resurrection. Ili montr DI ki ili neniam expected
sinful works ili earned montr them tre ajx ili uz mok vol ven haunt them
Se human tusx adversity li implores us as baldaux as ni bestow ben him li dir mi ating this my cleverness! Ja this est nur test plej de them ne kon
Those antaux them uttered sam ajx their earnings ne help them en des malplej
Ili sufer consequences their evil works Similarly transgressors prezent generaci sufer consequences their evil works ili ne escape
Ili ne realize DI est Unu Do increases provision whomever Li chooses withholds? These est lecion popol kred
Proklam O My servants exceeded lim neniam despair de di mercy! Por DI forgives all pek! Li est Forgiver Merciful
Vi obe your Lord submit Him totally retribution overtakes vi; tiam vi ne help
Sekv put path ke pint vi your Lord retribution overtakes vi suddenly when vi malpli expect gxi
Lest anim dir Kiel sorry mi est disregarding di commandments; mi est certainly 1 de mockers
Dir Hav DI direkt me mi est kun des righteous
Aux dir when gxi seg retribution mi get another sxanc mi work righteousness
jes ja (vi did get suficx sxanc)! My proofs ven vi vi rejected them torn arrogant igx disbeliever
Tag Resurrection vi seg vizagx de those who lied DI kovr kun mizer. est Infer ne dekstr retribution por arrogant unu
DI testament sav those argument righteousness; Li rekompenc them. Ne harm tusx them nor vol ili hav any grief
DI est Creator all AJX LI est en PLEN control all AJX
Al Him aparten all decisions heavens ter those disbelieve di revelations est efektiv losers
Dir gxi ali than DI vi exhort me Est worship O vi ignorant unu
Gxi revealed vi kaj those antaux vi ke vi ever commit idol worship all your works nullified vi est losers
Do vi worship DI sol est appreciative
Ili neniam fathom greatness DI. whole ter est His pugn Tag Resurrection. En fakt, univers fald His dekstr man. Li glor; Li est mult tro alt super bezon any partners
Korn blov whereupon everyone heavens ter strik unconscious escept those sxpar DI! Tiam gxi blov re whereupon ili testament all roz up rigard
Tiam ter lum light its Lord record proklam prophets witnesses brought for! Everyone tiam jugx equitably malplej injustice
Cxiu anim est pag por whatever gxi did Li est fully aware da cxio ili done

Those disbelieved est konduk al Infer en throngs When ili get gxi its gates opened its gard dir Did vi ne ricev messengers el vi recited al vi revelations your Lord avert vi meeting this tag? Ili respond Jes ja! Vort ‘retribution' jam stamp disbelievers
Gxi dir Enter gates Infer wherein vi abide forever Ki miserable destiny por des arrogant
Those reverenced their Lord est konduk al Paradise en throngs When ili get gxi its gates opened its gard dir Pac est vi; vi won Do vi abide herein forever
Ili dir Lauxd est al DI fulfilled His promes us far us hered ter gxu Paradise as ni placx. Ki bel recompense workers
Vi seg angxel floating around tron glor lauxd their Lord Post equitable judgment issued al all gxi proklam Lauxd est DI Lord univers
M
This revelation scripture est DI Almighty Omniscient
Forgiver pek acceptor repentance strict en enforcing retribution possessor all potenc! tie ne est ali di Him. Al Him est ultimate destiny
Neniom argues di revelations escept those disbelieve! Ne impon their apparent success

Disbelieving them est popol Noah many ali opponents them! Cxiu community persekut their messenger neutralize him. Ili argued falsehood defeat truth. Consequently mi pun them; kiel terrible est My retribution
Tiel judgment your Lord jam stamp upon those disbelieve ti ili est dwellers Infer

Those serv tron all those around gxi glor lauxd their Lord kred en Him! Ili pet forgiveness those kred Our Lord Your mercy Your knowledge encompass all ajx. Forgive those pent sekv Your path sxpar them retribution Infer
Our Lord admit them gxarden Eden Vi promes them kaj por righteous among their parents spouses infan. Vi est Almighty Sagx
Kaj protekt them fal en pek! Whomever Vi protekt fal en pek ti tag ating mercy Vi! This est greatest triumf
Those disbelieve told di abhorrence vi est eben mav than your own abhorrence yourselves. Vi invit kred vi chose disbelieve
Ili dir Our Lord vi put us death twice Vi don us 2 viv; nun ni konfes our pek! est tie any voj out
This est when DI SOL advokat vi disbelieved when others menci Him vi kred. Do di judgment issued Li est plej Alt des Great
Li est 1 continuously montr vi His proofs send down vi cxiel provisions Nur those totally submit est able al pren heed
Do vi devote your worship absolutely DI SOL eben se disbelievers dislike gxi
Possessor de alt rang Ruler whole dominion. Li send inspiration bor His ordon al whomever Li chooses His servants avert Tag de Summoning
Ke est tag when everyone completely exposed neniom da them kasx anything el DI! Al whom aparten all sovereignty ke tag? Al DI 1 Supreme
Ke tag cxiu anim requited whatever gxi earned tie ne est injustice ke tag. DI est efficient EN reckoning
avert them imminent tag when kor terrified many vol est remorseful. transgressors ne hav amik nor intercessor obe
Li est fully aware da ki okul ne seg cxio mens conceal
DI JUGX equitably while idols ILI implore Him NE JUGX anything. DI EST UNU est Hearer Seer
Ili ne roam ter Did not consequences por those antaux them? Ili uz est fort than ili productive sur ter. Di pun them their pek nothing protekt them DI
Ke est their messengers ir them klar proofs ili disbelieved Consequently DI pun them. Li est Tre strict en enforcing retribution
Ni send Moses our sign profound auxtoritat
Al Pharaoh Haamaan Qaaroon. Ili dir magician; liar
Kaj when li montr them truth el us ili dir Kill fil de those kred him sxpar their daughters. Tiel scheming disbelievers est cxiam wicked
Pharaoh dir Let me kill Moses let him implore his Lord Mi worry lest li corrupts your religi stern evil throughout land
Moses dir mi streb rifugx my Lord your Lord el cxiu arrogant unu ne kred en Tag Reckoning

kred hom Pharaoh's popol concealing his belief est dir Kiel vi kill hom can just por dir ‘My Lord DI ' li montr vi est hav klar proofs el your Lord Li est liar est his problem kaj li est truthful vi benefit el his promes. Surely DI ne direkt any transgressor liar
O my popol hodiaux vi hav kingship upperhand! who help us kontraux di judgment should gxi ven us? Pharaoh dir Vi est sekv nur ki mi seg dec mi direkt vi nur dekstr path
Unu kred dir O my popol mi tim vi sam sort previous opponents
opponents Noah ‘Aad Thamoud others ven them. DI NE wish any injustice POPOL
O my popol mi tim por vi Tag de Summoning
Est tag when vi wish turn around flee! nothing protekt vi tiam DI. Whomever DI send astray nothing direkt him

Joseph ven vi antaux ke klar revelations vi ad dub his message Tiam when li mort vi dir "DI testament ne send any ali messenger him! (Li est last messenger!) DI tiel send astray those est transgressors doubtful
Ili argue di revelations any basis. This est trajt plej abhorred DI per those kred. DI TIEL SIGEL KOR CXIU arrogant TIRAN
Pharaoh dir O Haamaan cxarpent me alt tur mi reach out discover
(Mi want reach heaven pren jen di Moses Mi kred li est liar. Do est evil works Pharaoh ornam en his okul tiel li kept sekv dekstr) path! Pharaoh's scheming est ver evil
Unu kred dir O my popol sekv me mi direkt vi en des tuj voj
O my popol this 1 life est temporary iluzi while Hereafter est etern abode
Whoever commits pek requited just ke whoever works righteousness! - Vir female - while kred these enter Paradise wherein ili ricev provisions any lim
O my popol while mi invit vi sav vi invit me hellfire
Vi invit me est unappreciative de DI set Him idols mi ne recognize. Mi invit vi Almighty Forgiver
Tie est ne dub ke ki vi invit me do ne hav basis en this mond nor Hereafter ke our ultimate return est DI ke transgressors incurred hellfire
Kelk tag vi memor ki mi telling vi tuj Mi las judgment this materi DI; DI est Seer all popol
DI TIAM protekt him EL their evil schemes while POPOL Pharaoh incurred MAV retribution
Infer montr them tag kaj nokt, Tag Resurrection Admit Pharaoh's popol into mav retribution
As ili argue Infer followers dir al their estr Ni do gxi uz your followers est vi sxpar us any part this Infer
Estr dir Ni est all en this together DI JUGX among des popol
Those en hellfire dir al guardians Infer Vok your Lord redukt retribution us eben unu tag
Ili dir Did vi ne ricev your messengers liver vi klar messages Ili respond Jes ni did Ili dir Tiam implore vi wish imploring de disbelievers est cxiam en vain
plej assuredly ni don victory our messengers those kred ambaux en this mond tag witnesses summoned
Ke tag apologies disbelievers ne benefit them. Ili incurred condemnation; ili incurred mav destiny
Ni don Moses guidance far Infan Israel hered scripture
(Their histori) est lecion reminder those posed intelligence
Do est pacient di promes est ver pet forgiveness your pek glor lauxd your Lord nokt tag
Surely those who argue di revelations proof est exposing arrogance kasx their kest ili est ne eben aware da gxi! Do streb rifugx DI; Li est Hearer Seer
creation de heavens ter est ecx awesome than creation human est plej popol ne kon
Ne egal est blind seer. Nor est those kred work righteousness egal al sinners! Rarely do vi pren heed
plej certainly Hor (Tag Judgment ven ne dub gxi plej popol ne kred)
Your Lord dir Implore Me mi respond vi! Surely those est tro arrogant worship Me enter Gehenna forcibly
DI EST UNU DESEGN NOKT TIAL VI RIPOZ gxi, TAG lighted. DI bestows many blessings POPOL PLEJ POPOL NE est thankful
Such est DI your Lord Creator all ajx. tie ne est di escept Li! Kiel vi deviate
Deviating est those disregard di revelations
DI EST UNU rendered TER habitable POR VI CXIEL formidable STRUKTUR LI DESEGN VI DESEGN VI NU. Li est Unu proviz vi bon provisions Such est DI your Lord Exalted est DI Lord univers
Li est Viv tie ne est di escept Li! Vi worship Him sol devoting your religi absolutely Him sol! Lauxd est DI Lord univers
dir mi enjoined worshipping idols vi worship DI when klar revelations ven me my Lord Mi komand submit Lord univers

Li est Unu kre vi polv subsequently tiny gut tiam el pend embryo tiam Li brings vi out infan tiam Li lets vi reach maturity tiam vi igx old - kelk da vi mort fru. Vi ating predetermined agx vi kompren
Li est nur Unu controls life death. Al hav anything done Li simply dir al Est gxi est
Vi not those argue di proofs kaj kiel ili hav deviated
Ili est des unu disbelieved scripture messages ni send our messengers. Do ili do gxi surely trov out
shackles est their kol cxen est uz al tren them
En Inferno tiam en Fajr ili brul
Ili pet Kie est idols vi uz worship
beside DI? Ili dir Ili abandoned us. En fakt, when ni worshipped them ni worshipping nothing. Do does DI send disbelievers astray
This vi uz gxoj false doctrines ter vi uz promote them
Enter gates Gehenna wherein vi abide forever Ki miserable destiny por arrogant unu
Vi est pacient di promes est truth. Ni montr vi kelk da (retribution) ni promes them terminate your life antaux ke, ili returned us
Ni send messengers vi - kelk da them ni menci vi kelk ni ne menci vi. Ne messenger produkt any mirakl di authorization Once di judgment issued truth dominates falsifiers exposed humiliated
DI EST UNU KRE livestock VI; KELK VI RAJD KELK VI MANGX
Ili ankaux proviz vi additional benefits sat many da your bezon. Sur them ankaux as sur sxip vi port
Li tiel montr vi His proofs Which de di proofs vi deny
Ili ne roamed ter not consequences those preceded them? Ili uz est greater numer greater en potenc posed greater legacy ter. all their achievements ne help them en des malplej
When their messengers ir them klar proofs ili gxoj knowledge ili hered tre ajx ili ridiculed est ig their auxtun
Subsequently when ili seg our retribution ili dir Nun ni kred en DI SOL ni tuj disbelieve idol worship ti ni uz practice
Their belief tiam ne help them en des malplej once ili seg our retribution. Such est di sistem establ deal kun His creatures; disbelievers cxiam doomed
M
revelation el plej Gracious Merciful
scripture vers proviz komplet detal Arabic Quran popol kon
bearer bon news ankaux as warner. plej de them turn ili ne auxd
Ili dir Our mens est far up our orel est surd al your message barrier separates us el vi! Do ki vi want kaj tial vol ni
dir mi est ne plur than human est vi inspir ke your di est 1 di. Vi est devoted al Him pet His forgiveness! Ve al idol worshipers
Who ne don obligatory charity (Zakat) regard Hereafter ili est disbelievers
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ricev put ind recompense
Dir Vi disbelieve Unu kre ter 2 tag vi set idols rang Him Li est Lord univers
Li ej gxi stabilizers (mont) far gxi productive Li kalkul its provisions 4 tag sat bezon de all its inhabitants
Tiam Li torn cxiel when gxi est ankoraux gas dir al gxi ter Ven existence volont unwillingly. Ili dir Ni ven volont
Tiel Li komplet 7 univers 2 tag set legx cxiu univers! Ni ornam lowest univers lamp ej gard gxi! Such est desegn Almighty Omniscient
Ili turn tiam dir mi avert vi de disaster disaster annihilated ‘Aad Thamoud
Their messengers ir them ankaux as antaux them post them dir Vi ne worship DI. Ili dir Hav our Lord willed Li send angxel! Ni est disbelievers ki vi dir
As por ‘Aad ili torn arrogant ter opposed truth dir Who powerful than ni? est ili ne realize ti DI kre them est powerful than ili? Ili est unappreciative de our revelations
Consequently ni send them violent vent a few miserable tag. Ni tiel aflikt them humiliating retribution en this life retribution Hereafter est humiliating ili neniam win
As por Thamoud ni proviz them guidance ili prefer blindness guidance. Consequently disastrous shameful retribution annihilated them ki ili earned
Ni cxiam sav those kred plumb righteous life
Tag ven when enemies de DI testament summoned hellfire forcibly
Once ili get tie their own auxd okul hauxt bor witness cxio ili done
Ili dir al their hauxt did vi bor witness us? Ili respond DI far us parol Li est Unu kauxz cxio parol! Li est Unu kre vi 1 temp tuj vi returned Him
tie ne est voj vi kasx el your own auxd your okul your hauxt! En fakt, vi opini DI est unaware de mult de ki vi do
This kind da pens your Lord testament kauxz vi fal kaj tiam vi igx losers
Ili ad voj ili est Infer est their destiny kaj ili far up pretekst ili ne pretekst
Ni asign them companions ornam cxio ili do en their okul. Tiel ili end incurring sam sort previous communities de jinns humans est ankaux losers
Those disbelieved dir ne auxskult al this Quran distort gxi ke vi win
Ni certainly aflikt these disbelievers severe retribution. Ni certainly requite them their evil works
Such est requital awaits di enemies. Infer est their etern abode; just requital por discarding our revelations
Those disbelieved dir Our Lord montr us those 2 kinds! - jinns humans - who misled us ni trample them our fut render them lowliest
Those proklam Our Lord est DI tiam plumb righteous life angxel descend them Vi ne hav tim nor shall vi grieve Gxoj bon news Paradise hav rezerv vi
Ni est your allies en this life Hereafter Vi hav gxi anything vi wish vi hav anything vi want
(Such est your) ultimate abode el Forgiver Merciful
Who utter put vort than unu invit DI works righteousness dir mi est 1 de submitters
Ne egal est bon response mav response. Vi resort nicest possible response. Tiel unu uz est your enemy maj igx your put amik
Neniom ating this those steadfastly persevere Neniom ating this those est extremely fortunate
When diabl flustr ide vi vi streb rifugx DI. Li est Hearer Omniscient
Among His proofs est nokt tag sun lun. Ne prostrate sun nor lun; vi fal prostrate DI kre them vi ver worship Him sol
Ili est tro arrogant do this tiam those your Lord glor Him nokt tag sen ever lac
Among His proofs est ti vi seg land ankoraux tiam as baldaux as ni dusx gxi akv gxi vibr life! Surely Unu revived gxi revive dead Li est Omnipotent
Surely those distort our revelations ne kasx us. Unu gets jxet Infer put unu ven secure Tag Resurrection? Do whatever vi wish Li est Seer de cxio vi do
Those rejected Quran's proof when gxi ven them ankaux rejected Honorable libr
Ne falsehood enter gxi en des preter en des future revelation el Sagx Praiseworthy
Ki est dir al vi est precisely ki est dir al previous messengers! Your Lord posed forgiveness Li ankaux posed painful retribution

Ni far gxi non-Arabic Quran ili dir did gxi ven en ke idiom? Whether est Arabic non-Arabic dir those kred gxi est direkt healing As por those disbelieve ili est surd blind gxi as ili addressed el faraway
Ni don Moses scripture gxi ankaux disput! Se ne est your Lord's predetermined decision ili jugx tuj. Ja ili haven tro many dub
Whoever works righteousness does por his own bon whoever works evil does tial his own detriment! Your Lord est neniam unjust towards popol
